mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITM_MEMBER WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND MEM_MAIL = #{email}
SELECT MEM_IDX AS memIdx, MEM_NAME AS memName, MEM_MAIL AS memMail, MEM_TEL AS memTel, MEM_PW AS memPw FROM ITM_MEMBER WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND MEM_MAIL = #{inputMail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITM_MEMBER( MEM_NAME, MEM_MAIL, MEM_PW, MEM_TEL, REG_DATE ) VALUES( #{memName}, #{memMail}, #{memPw}, #{memTel}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ITM_MEMBER SET MEM_TEL = #{memTel}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE MEM_IDX = #{memIdx}
UPDATE ITM_MEMBER SET MEM_PW = #{memPw}, MOD_DATE = NOW() WHERE MEM_IDX = #{memIdx}
